data.job_description:
Cloud Solution Architect (Banking Sector)

M√°laga- Hybrid

Our client, a top-tier global financial institution, is seeking a Cloud Solution Architect to strengthen its Cloud & Engineering capabilities.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design and define cloud infrastructure patterns (AWS/Azure) for enterprise projects
‚Ä¢ Translate cloud reference architectures into solution designs for real business use cases
‚Ä¢ Automate infrastructure patterns and IaC using Terraform and Ansible
‚Ä¢ Implement and optimize CI/CD processes using GitHub Actions
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with engineering teams to integrate cloud solutions seamlessly
‚Ä¢ Advise CIO and technical leaders on cloud best practices and architecture strategy
‚Ä¢ Present complex technical solutions to varied audiences‚Äîtechnical and bu

Experience:
‚Ä¢ 5+ years in infrastructure, networks, and database architecture.
‚Ä¢ 3+ years in distributed application design & cloud consulting
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with AWS and/or Azure
‚Ä¢ Expertise in Terraform, Crossplane, Ansible, and automation frameworks
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of DevOps & CI/CD pipelines
‚Ä¢ Programming knowledge in Python, Go, Bash

If you are a passionate and dedicated IT Professional looking to join a dynamic and innovative organization, we encourage you to apply

About Us:

HBX Group is a leading B2B ecosystem player in the TravelTech space, connecting and empowering businesses in the ever-evolving world of travel. We drive growth for our clients and partners while removing friction from the end-to-end travel experience. Our cloud-based technology platforms offer fast and reliable access to a unique portfolio of travel products & services, while rich data and intelligence seamlessly connect supply and demand worldwide.

We have over more than 3,000 experts worldwide, including specialists on the ground who provide insights and support to boost trading even further, especially in the most hard-to-reach segments. This unique blend of technology, data and passionate people serves as a catalyst for all businesses aiming to unlock their full potential in the travel arena.

HBX Group comprises four best-in-class B2B brands that meet the needs of its growing and diverse client base across 190+ global markets.

Job Summary

We are looking for a Solution Architect to join our team, working within our agile teams focusing on design, impact analysis and outcome of our solutions.

Our Solution Architects interface heavily with our Enterprise Architects protecting outcome and estimates and adhering and contributing to the overall agreed strategy, standards and guidelines.

Our Solution Architects also create tech interest, generating "buzz" about the latest developments from a technical perspective and applicability in their domain.

Job Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Ensure technological performance by design, right-sizing, scalability and reliability
‚Ä¢ Ensure that architectural standards and best practices are followed
‚Ä¢ Ensure the Definition of Done is followed at technical level
‚Ä¢ Analyze technical trade-offs
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the scope definition
‚Ä¢ Define non-functional requirements
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the Definition of Done definition
‚Ä¢ Guardian of the services' security and performance.
‚Ä¢ Support the team during significant technological changes
‚Ä¢ Contribute decisively to the definition of reference architectures and standards
‚Ä¢ Detect weaknesses and failure points within the solutions and propose improvements
‚Ä¢ Key figure for the reduction of technical debt and technological evolution
‚Ä¢ Participate and drive keeping technical documentation up to date
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in defining the technical and functional monitoring
‚Ä¢ Negotiate with the product leads the prioritization of those initiatives that are considered important for our technological evolution.
‚Ä¢ Advocate of new technological features

Required Skills
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of software or platform design and experience in E2E architecture solutions
‚Ä¢ Bachelor or Master in Computer Science or a related degree.
‚Ä¢ Experience designing and implementing Architectures using different database and cache types and messaging technologies.
‚Ä¢ Experience with frontend technologies such as Django and React
‚Ä¢ Experience with backend technologies in Python and or Java
‚Ä¢ Experience working in hybrid on premise-cloud environments
‚Ä¢ Experience designing and implementing high performing systems
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of continuous delivery processes and tools
‚Ä¢ Strong written and verbal communication skills in both English and Spanish
‚Ä¢ Technical reference and leadership abilities
‚Ä¢ Strong technical, logical, analytical and problem-solving skills
‚Ä¢ Good communication and influencing skills
‚Ä¢ Team player with an agile mind-set
‚Ä¢ Able to work under pressure and with shifting priorities
‚Ä¢ Ability to think outside the box, multi-task and efficiently managing time
‚Ä¢ Good learning attitude

Nice to have
‚Ä¢ Experience in the travel industry
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Agile Methodologies such as Scrum or Safe

At HBX Group, we believe that diversity drives innovation and makes travel a force for good. We're committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and respected, embracing different backgrounds, perspectives and talents. Join us and be part of a team where diversity and equal opportunities really do make a difference.

**Experience Level**:

- Experienced professional**Area**:

- IT**Location**:

- Calle Trinidad Grund 12, 29001 M√°laga**Employment Type**:

- Full-time**Company**:

- Drees & Sommer SE**Start Date**:

- By arrangement**YOUR TASKS**:

- Manage the entire sales pre-cycle from qualification to implementation team handover.
- Supporting and maintaining the pre-sales process throughout the sales cycle.
- Facilitating scoping meetings to understand the prospect‚Äôs business challenges.
- Identifying the necessary internal resources, such as industry experts and client advocates, to ensure success.
- Developing a value-based approach to address the prospect‚Äôs business issues, including defining success criteria.
- Collaborating with the sales team to define the scope of proposed solutions and deliverables.
- Optimising proposed solutions to enhance implementation team success and meet prospect requirements.
- Creating customer-facing documentation, presentations, and proposals in collaboration with sales and marketing.
- Providing input on value-based ROI proposals.
‚Ä¢ *YOUR PROFILE**:

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in related field, or equivalent training and experience.
- Minimum 7 years overall experience in Implementation, Project Management, Operations, Sales, and/or Solutions role
- Minimum 5 years‚Äô experience in Management Consulting preferred.
- Proven & verifiable track record of successful leadership.
- Ability to work independently with m√≠nimal supervision.
- A genuine team player and leader who will complement Drees & Sommer existing team whilst driving growth and helping us continuously improve.
- Your enthusiasm and passion for exercising best industry practices is what sets you apart from the rest.
- Your significant previous experience in a Presales or Consulting role means you can hit the ground running.
- You'll have a deep understanding of Customer Centric practices, Insights & Management processes.
- Communicating well is one of your strengths, you are articulate and adaptable and able to deliver presentations credibly to a varied audience.
- You create demonstrations and presentations that are impactful and tailored to meet the customers' needs.
- You are energised by supporting, guiding, and leading others directly or indirectly.
- You are happy to travel as part of the role and spend time client facing.
- Doing the best for your customer is one of your key motivators.
‚Ä¢ *YOUR ADVANTAGES**:
To ensure your **work-life balance**, we offer the option of mobile working

We promote **your professional and personal development** through individual training and further education at the Drees & Sommer Academy

We support your **health **with a bonus for sports enthusiasts. We offer the possibility of subscribing to a private health insurance policy

Employees benefit from tax advantages related to their commuting expenses for the office

Fiscal advantages for employees expenses in meal costs during the worktime. **Employee referral program** with attractive bonus scheme

Supporting **career and familiy** by receiving tax benefits for kindergarten expenses

Are you an open-minded and dedicated professional who revels in intellectually rigorous environments? Do you hold a high bar for the quality of your work and react to a mission-critical problem in an excellent way? Can you anticipate complications and formulate solutions to unblock the progress of the project? If it sounds like you, this could be the perfect opportunity to join EPAM as a Solution Architect.

Our client is one of the world‚Äôs biggest hedge funds, managing investments for a wide array of institutional clients, from charitable foundations to foreign governments and central banks. We are looking for a Solution Architect for the Lang team. The team is developing a DSL based on Scala. Users of the technology in the Department are extremely sophisticated investors who are also technically savvy and work in a deep partnership model with the engineers. Our goal is to build highly functional, beautiful, and intuitive technologies for these processes, which ultimately drive, scale, and enable our investment processes.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Lead designs of major software components, systems, and features (including patterns, NFRs)
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain scalable and efficient systems using Scala, ensuring high levels of performance and reliability
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in design discussions to provide business users with technical solutions and translate requirements into a detailed architectural blueprint
‚Ä¢ Define and evolve the team's core set of best practices, anticipate potential issues, and design for flexibility and resilience
‚Ä¢ Work closely with the business to understand key challenges and pain points, devising solutions to meet them. Clearly communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Create component- and object-level designs, as well as production, troubleshooting, and documentation of high-quality code
‚Ä¢ Ensure quality through defining and enforcing coding standards, guidelines, and best practices, focusing on robust, maintainable, and scalable systems

Requirements
‚Ä¢ 8+ years of professional software development experience in technically rigorous environments holding extremely high bars for their engineers
‚Ä¢ 10+ years of experience with strong hands-on experience, solid design/development background with Scala or Java
‚Ä¢ Strong computer science fundamentals with a mastery of backend platform-level development
‚Ä¢ Mathematics knowledge and understanding
‚Ä¢ Experience with complex backend systems and a fluency with contemporary programming languages, patterns, and architectures
‚Ä¢ Scala compiler plugin experience and syntax development
‚Ä¢ Excellent design skills (with the security focus, OOD, SOLID, GRASP, KISS, YAGNI, DRY, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with CI/CD, SDLC, Agile, and Design patterns
‚Ä¢ Strong algorithmic and debugging skills
‚Ä¢ Ability to dive into a complicated codebase without supervision
‚Ä¢ Strong soft skills such as stress tolerance, open-mindedness, proactiveness, preciseness and meticulousness
‚Ä¢ Ability to inspire and guide teams while fostering collaboration
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills (English - B2+/C1) to be able to effectively explain technical ideas to diverse audiences

We offer
‚Ä¢ Private health insurance
‚Ä¢ EPAM Employees Stock Purchase Plan
‚Ä¢ 100% paid sick leave
‚Ä¢ Referral Program
‚Ä¢ Professional certification
‚Ä¢ Language courses

EPAM is a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company with 61,700+ EPAMers in 55+ countries and regions. Since 1993, our multidisciplinary teams have been helping make the future real for our clients and communities around the world. In 2018, we opened an office in Spain that quickly grew to over 1,450 EPAMers distributed between the offices in M√°laga, Madrid and C√°ceres as well as remotely across the country. Here you will collaborate with multinational teams, contribute to numerous innovative projects, and have an opportunity to learn and grow continuously.
‚Ä¢ Why Join EPAM
‚Ä¢ WORK AND LIFE BALANCE. Enjoy more of your personal time with flexible work options, 24 working days of annual leave and paid time off for numerous public holidays.
‚Ä¢ CONTINUOUS LEARNING CULTURE. Craft your personal Career Development Plan to align with your learning objectives. Take advantage of internal training, mentorship, sponsored certifications and LinkedIn courses.
‚Ä¢ CLEAR AND DIFFERENT CAREER PATHS. Grow in engineering or managerial direction to become a People Manager, in-depth technical specialist, Solution Architect, or Project/Delivery Manager.
‚Ä¢ STRONG PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITY. Join a global EPAM community of highly skilled experts and connect with them to solve challenges, exchange ideas, share expertise and make friends.

Job DescriptionWe are seeking a seasoned Full Stack Developer to contribute to the design, development, and implementation of web components within our innovative low-code digitalization platform.In collaboration with the Product Management team, this role involves developing solutions for new feature requirements and enhancing the core functionalities of the platform.After an initial onboarding period, the position supports both product management and project teams by advising on technical solutions and the platform's capabilities.This role is embedded in a self-organized, agile development team working within a Scrum framework.Required Skills and QualificationsMandatoryBachelor's degree in computer science or related field.
+5 years' experience in software development.Angular, Vue or React knowledge where Angular is preferred.Experience building large-scale modern web applications.Proficiency in HTML 5 / CSS 3 / JavaScript (ES6) / TypeScript / NodeJS.Experience in Java Backend Development.Fluent English level.DesirableA good understanding of UX and UI principles.Worked in an agile environment.Coaching/Mentoring capabilities.Software Engineering knowledge (design patterns, principles, etc.).
Knowledge in TDD (unit testing, integration testing, system testing).
DevOps basic knowledge.Git and Jira Knowledge.BenefitsOpportunity to gain a comprehensive understanding of the product and how all components are integrated.Work as part of an international, self-organized team within an Agile development process based on Scrum methodologies.The role offers a high degree of autonomy, particularly suited to experienced Full Stack Developers who thrive in environments that encourage ownership and initiative.OthersKey responsibilities include:Contribute to the evolution of the product framework that powers web portal creation within the Low-Code platform.Implement and integrate frontend and backend components using Angular and Java.Design and develop complex features to meet milestone and sprint goals.Collaborate with QA to define comprehensive test plans and test cases.Provide mentorship and guidance to junior developers, supporting their growth and onboarding.

Power Platform Solutions Architect (m/f/d) Join to apply for the

Power Platform Solutions Architect (m/f/d)

role at

DEKRA Digital & Product Solutions

We are looking for a highly skilled

Senior Power Platform Solution Architect (h/m/d)

to lead the design, implementation, and governance of enterprise solutions built on Microsoft Power Platform. This role will play a strategic part in defining scalable and secure architectures aligned with business goals, collaborating with stakeholders, IT leaders, and development teams to drive innovation and digital transformation.

Key Responsibilities

Solution Design and Architecture:

Conceptualizing solutions, technical strategy, data modelling, security modelling, integration planning.

Implementation and Governance:

Guiding development, code reviews, testing and deployment, project governance.

Stakeholder Management and Communication:

Requirement gathering, communication, relationship building.

Staying Current:

Platform expertise, staying updated, thought leadership.

Technical Requirements

7+ years of experience in enterprise solution delivery using Microsoft Power Platform.

Proven experience in cloud solution architecture with Microsoft Azure.

Strong expertise in Dataverse, Model-Driven Apps, Canvas Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI.

Hands‚Äëon experience with ALM, DevOps, and CI/CD pipelines for Power Platform.

Experience in Dynamics 365 CE/CRM projects (desirable).

Solid understanding of data modeling, security, API integrations, Azure Functions, API Management, Logic Apps.

In‚Äëdepth knowledge of Power Platform and licensing models.

Certifications (Required / Preferred)

Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Solution Architect (required).

Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate (preferred).

Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert (preferred).

Soft Skills

Strategic thinker with strong enterprise architecture vision.

Excellent communication skills to engage both technical and business audiences.

Strong leadership and mentoring capabilities.

Problem‚Äësolving mindset with a focus on innovation.

Experience working in Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban).

Offer We offer you an excellent opportunity to grow and develop your career in a leading multinational organization.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

üöÄWe are looking for the very Top Talent‚Ä¶and we would be delighted if you were to join our team!

More in details, UST is a multinational company based in North America, certified as a Top Employer company with over 35.000 employees all over the world and presence in more than 30 countries. We are leaders on digital technology services, and we provide large-scale technologic solutions to big companies.

üîé What are we looking for?

We are looking for a Cloud Solution Architect to join our team and work with one of our clients in the banking sector.

üìçLocation: M√°laga, Spain

Work mode: Hybrid (3 days working in the office, 2 days from home).

üìã Key Responsibilities

As a Cloud Architect, reporting to the Head of BaaS Engineering at SCIB, your mission will be to design architecture patterns and solutions in Public/Private Cloud (AWS/Azure), ensuring their adoption in the various areas of SCIB.

You will also be key in automating CI/CD and IaC processes to improve the efficiency and scalability of the infrastructure with tools such as Terraform, Ansible and GitHub Actions..

Required Qualifications
‚Ä¢ + 5 years of experience in infrastructure architecture, databases, and networks.
‚Ä¢ + 3 years of experience in design, implementation, or consulting of distributed applications.
‚Ä¢ + 3 years of experience in evaluating technologies and cloud platforms.
‚Ä¢ + 3 years of experience in design, consulting, or implementation of cloud solutions (microservices, Big Data, hybrid clouds).
‚Ä¢ + 2 years of experience in IaC tools and automation processes.
‚Ä¢ - Experience in presenting technical solutions to different audiences.

SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE

- Cloud architecture and operation: advanced experience with Azure and AWS.

- DevOps and CI/CD: practical knowledge of GitHub Actions and other continuous integration/delivery processes.

- Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) and automation: experience with Terraform, Crossplane, Ansible, and similar tools.

- Experience with platform solutions such as Backstage or Humanitec (desirable) and knowledge of state-of-the-art platform engineering architecture and strategies.

- Programming languages: Python, Go, Bash, with a focus on automation. - Communication and presentation skills: ability to convey technical ideas clearly and effectively.

- Languages: high level of English (oral and written).

üí∞What can we offer?

‚úàÔ∏è 23 days of Annual Leave plus the 24th and 31st of December as discretionary days!

‚ù§Ô∏è Numerous benefits (Health Care Plan, teleworking compensation, Life and Accident Insurances).

üç¥ `Retribuci√≥n Flexible¬¥ Program: (Meals, Kinder Garden, Transport, online English lessons, Health Care Plan‚Ä¶)

üéì Free access to several training platforms

üöÄ Professional stability and career plans

üö∂ UST also, compensates referrals from which you could benefit when you refer professionals.

üîó The option to pick between 12 or 14 payments along the year.

üè° Real Work Life Balance measures (flexibility, WFH or remote work policy, compacted hours during summertime‚Ä¶)

üéÅ UST Club Platform discounts and gym Access discounts

üìß If you would like to know more, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply and we‚Äôll get in touch to fill you in detail. We are waiting for you!

In UST we are committed to equal opportunities in our selection processes and do not discriminate based on race, gender, disability, age, religion, sexual orientation or nationality. We have a special commitment to Disability & Inclusion, so we are interested in hiring people with disability certificate.

We are looking for a Senior Enterprise Solutions Architect - MS Dynamics 365 to design and implement enterprise-grade solutions that digitize and scale our warehouse and finance operations across Africa.

''This role offers the opportunity to drive significant organizational value through hands-on configuration and optimization of Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations, with particular focus on Supply Chain solutions. You'll work closely with the Senior Product Manager for Inventory and talented cross-functional teams including engineers, warehouse operations managers, finance managers, and business stakeholders across multiple countries.''

About Us

We foster a low-ego environment where diversity, innovation, and collaboration drive both commercial growth and social impact. Our team values psychological safety and takes a discovery-first approach to problem solving. You'll be empowered to leverage your technical expertise to solve complex business problems and implement solutions that transform our operational capabilities.

Although coding is not required for this role, we're looking for someone with a growth mindset who is curious to learn software development fundamentals and excited by the opportunity to contribute to our event-driven microservices that extend Dynamics 365 capabilities.

In this role, you would be responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Managing end-to-end implementations of Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O solutions, from requirements gathering to post-go-live support
‚Ä¢ Designing and configuring Supply Chain Management modules including warehouse management, inventory, logistics, procurement, and manufacturing
‚Ä¢ Architecting Finance modules including landed cost, invoicing, tax compliance, and financial reporting
‚Ä¢ Driving digital transformation of operations through D365 optimization and automation initiatives
‚Ä¢ Serving as the Dynamics 365 expert, advising teams on optimal platform utilization and integration strategies
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with Product Managers and Engineers to translate business requirements into technical solutions
‚Ä¢ Ensuring inventory management meets financial and audit compliance requirements through proper system configuration
‚Ä¢ Providing training and support to end-users across warehouse operations, finance, and other business units

This is a fully remote role reporting to the Head of Engineering - Acquisition Sales and working within the UTC -1 through UTC+3 time zones.

Your application should demonstrate:
‚Ä¢ 5+ years designing, configuring, and deploying Microsoft D365 Finance & Operations solutions
‚Ä¢ Strong background in ERP concepts including supply chain, warehouse management, inventory, and finance operations
‚Ä¢ Experience managing complex stock movements, reverse logistics, and repair tracking systems
‚Ä¢ Proven track record of end-to-end D365 F&O implementations from requirements gathering to post-go-live support
‚Ä¢ Experience with multi-phase, multi-country, enterprise-wide implementations
‚Ä¢ Ability to work with diverse, distributed teams across multiple countries
‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with experience in data-driven decision making
‚Ä¢ Experience with agile methodologies and cross-functional team collaboration
‚Ä¢ Nice to have: Microsoft Dynamics 365 certifications (MB-300, MB-330), experience with Power BI/SSRS, background in financial services or emerging markets

If the above is of interest to you, please apply.

Why M-KOPA?

At M-KOPA, we empower our people to own their careers through diverse development programs, coaching partnerships, and on-the-job training. We support individual journeys with family-friendly policies, prioritize well-being, and embrace flexibility.

Join us in shaping the future of M-KOPA as we grow together. Explore more at m-kopa.com.

Recognized four times by the Financial Times as one Africa's fastest growing companies (2022, 2023, 2024 and 2025) and by TIME100 Most influential companies in the world 2023 and 2024 , we've served over 6 million customers, unlocking $1.5 billion in cumulative credit for the unbanked across Africa.

Important Notice

M-KOPA is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer committed to assembling a diverse, broadly trained staff. Women, minorities, and people with disabilities are strongly encouraged to apply.

M-KOPA explicitly prohibits the use of Forced or Child Labour and respects the rights of its employees to agree to terms and conditions of employment voluntarily, without coercion, and freely terminate their employment on appropriate notice. M-KOPA shall ensure that its Employees are of legal working age and shall comply with local laws for youth employment or student work, such as internships or apprenticeships.

M-KOPA does not collect/charge any money as a pre-employment or post-employment requirement. This means that we never ask for ‚Äòrecruitment fees‚Äô, ‚Äòprocessing fees‚Äô, ‚Äòinterview fees‚Äô, or any other kind of money in exchange for offer letters or interviews at any time during the hiring process.

Applications for this position will be reviewed on a rolling basis. Shortlisting and interviews will take place at any stage during the recruitment process. We reserve the right to close the vacancy early if a suitable candidate is selected before the advertised closing date.

If your application is successful M-KOPA undertakes pre-employment background checks as part of its recruitment process, these include; criminal records, identification verification, academic qualifications, employment dates and employer references.

Cloud Solution Architect
Company Description

Talan - Positive Innovation

Talan is an international consulting group specializing in innovation and business transformation through technology. With over 7,200 consultants in 21 countries and a turnover of 850M, we are committed to delivering impactful, future-ready solutions.

Talan at a Glance

Headquartered in Paris and operating globally, Talan combines technology, innovation, and empowerment to deliver measurable results for our clients. Over the past 22 years, weve built a strong presence in the IT and consulting landscape, and were on track to reach 1 billion in revenue this year.

Our Core Areas of Expertise
‚Ä¢ Data Technologies: We design and implement large-scale, end-to-end architecture and data solutions, including data integration, data science, visualization, Big Data, AI, and Generative AI.
‚Ä¢ Cloud Application Services: We integrate leading platforms such as SAP, Salesforce, Oracle, Microsoft, AWS, and IBM Maximo, helping clients transition to the cloud and improve operational efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Management Innovation Consulting: We lead business and digital transformation initiatives through project and change management best practices (PM, PMO, Agile, Scrum, Product Ownership), and support domains such as Supply Chain, Cybersecurity, and ESG/Low-Carbon strategies.

We work with major global clients across diverse sectors, including Transport Logistics, Financial Services, Energy Utilities, Retail, and Media Telecommunications.

Job Description

As a Cloud Architect, reporting to the Head of BaaS Engineering at CIB, your mission will be to design architecture patterns and solutions in Public/Private Cloud, ensuring their adoption in the various areas of CIB. You will also be key in automating CI/CD and IaC processes to improve the efficiency and scalability of the infrastructure.

We need someone like you to help us in different areas:

Design and implementation of cloud architectures:
‚Ä¢ Analyze and design infrastructure pattern architectures in the public cloud (AWS/Azure).
‚Ä¢ Develop infrastructure designs tailored to each use case, translating pattern architecture into the reality of each project.
‚Ä¢ Ensure compliance with the groups reference standards for the public cloud and provide feedback in internal forums.

Automation and optimization:
‚Ä¢ Automate and develop the infrastructure pattern catalog.
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage IaC (Infrastructure as Code) tools such as Terraform and Ansible.
‚Ä¢ Design and implement CI/CD pipelines using tools like GitHub Actions.

Collaboration and Advisory:
‚Ä¢ Advise the CIO teams of CIB on the adoption of public cloud technologies.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with other engineering teams to ensure the smooth integration of cloud solutions.

Qualifications

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR

EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ More than 5 years of experience in infrastructure architecture, databases, and networks.
‚Ä¢ More than 3 years of experience in design, implementation, or consulting of distributed applications.
‚Ä¢ More than 3 years of experience in evaluating technologies and cloud platforms.
‚Ä¢ More than 3 years of experience in design, consulting, or implementation of cloud solutions (microservices, Big Data, hybrid clouds).
‚Ä¢ More than 2 years of experience in IaC tools and automation processes.
‚Ä¢ Experience in presenting technical solutions to different audiences.

EDUCACI√ìN
‚Ä¢ Bachelor or Degree in Engineering.
‚Ä¢ Certification in Azure / AWS. (Desirable)

SKILLS KNOWLEDGE
‚Ä¢ Cloud architecture and operation: advanced experience with Azure and AWS.
‚Ä¢ DevOps and CI/CD: practical knowledge of GitHub Actions and other continuous integration/delivery processes.
‚Ä¢ Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) and automation: experience with Terraform, Crossplane, Ansible, and similar tools.
‚Ä¢ Experience with platform solutions such as Backstage or Humanitec (desirable) and knowledge of state-of-the-art platform engineering architecture and strategies.
‚Ä¢ Programming languages: Python, Go, Bash, with a focus on automation.
‚Ä¢ Communication and presentation skills: ability to convey technical ideas clearly and effectively.
‚Ä¢ Languages: high level of English (oral and written).

Additional Information

What do we offer you?
‚Ä¢ Full-time contract.
‚Ä¢ Smart Office Pack so that you can work comfortably from home.
‚Ä¢ Training and career development.
‚Ä¢ Benefits and perks such as private medical insurance, life insurance.
‚Ä¢ Possibility to be part of a multicultural team and work on international projects.
‚Ä¢ This is a hybrid position based in M√°laga, Spain. Relocation is mandatory.
‚Ä¢ Possibility to manage work-permits.

If you are passionate about development tech, we want to meet you!

Talan Spains commitment to non-discrimination based on gender, race, ideology, or any other reason, in accordance with the companys Equality Plan and the current regulations on gender equality between women and men (Royal Decree-Law 6/2019).

Required Skill Profession

Computer Occupations

Would you like to be part of our new adventure? Vodafone Group launched its new technological HUB in 2021, an international center of excellence dedicated to research and development of technical solutions, such as Secure Networks, 5G and 6G development, Open RAN, IoT, MPN & MEC and UCC for Vodafone Business, platforms and enterprise solutions. This vacancy is part of VOIS Spain, legal entity part of Vodafone Group. Come and join us to create the future together!

Role Purpose

Join a team of cloud solution experts working on product co-creation with one of the world‚Äôs leading technology companies, upskilling both technical and sales personnel while driving the development of Cloud Managed Services with Azure. The goal is to provide Vodafone business customers with fully managed cloud services, allowing them to use their applications without worrying about infrastructure, storage, or backups. For customers not yet on Azure, the team also supports migration to this technology. With 10 Solution Architects already in place, we seek an experienced professional ready to contribute from day one.

As a Cloud Solutions Architect, you will support the development of Cloud & Edge offerings within Vodafone Business, defining architecture roadmaps and producing technical documentation. You will play a key role in capturing and sharing architecture best practices, guiding product and solution designers, and collaborating with other architecture teams within Vodafone. Additionally, you will drive cross-technology architecture strategies, forming working groups focused on enterprise product and business system technologies. This is a challenging and rewarding role for a professional eager to innovate in a dynamic environment.

What you bring
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in software development, leading end to end solution development/solution assurance.
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of the application and development of products/strategies relating to Cloud technology with focus on MS Azure (AWS is nice to have).
‚Ä¢ Technical ‚Äúhands-on‚Äù engineering skills in private and public Cloud technology
‚Ä¢ Advanced English level.
‚Ä¢ Devops is desirable.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Hybrid work model (100% remote out of Madrid or M√°laga).
‚Ä¢ Bonus on top of the gross salary.
‚Ä¢ Meal voucher (Ticket Restaurant), additional to gross salary.
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours from Monday to Thursday, and an intensive schedule on Fridays.
‚Ä¢ Intensive Summer Schedule during July and August.
‚Ä¢ Up to 20 days per year of 100% remote work from other locations.
‚Ä¢ Private Health and Life Insurance for employees.
‚Ä¢ 25 vacation days, plus December 24th and 31st off.
‚Ä¢ Optional Pension Plan.
‚Ä¢ Access to an online learning platform for continuous training.

Please, apply with an English version of your CV.

Why Vodafone?

At Vodafone, we are dedicated to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment. We take pride in our commitment to providing equal opportunities to individuals of all backgrounds and abilities. We firmly believe that diversity includes a spectrum of experiences, and we welcome and support individuals with functional diversity. Our mission is to create an accessible workplace where all team members can thrive, regardless of their unique abilities or challenges. We are committed to making reasonable accommodations to ensure that everyone can fully participate and excel in our organization. We value the unique perspectives and talents that individuals with functional diversity bring to our team and consider them an integral part of our success and innovation.

We recognize and celebrate the importance of diversity and inclusivity in our workplace so that we are as diverse as the customers and communities we serve. We do not tolerate any form of discrimination especially related to but not limited to race, colour, age, veteran status, gender identification, sexual orientation, pregnancy, ethnicity, disability, religion, political affiliation, trade union membership, nationality, indigenous status, medical condition, HIV status, social origin, cultural background, social or marital status.

REF: 246274

About the Role

We are seeking a strategic and technically proficient Solutions Architect to join Sanoma Learning and help shape the future of our digital learning platforms. This role is pivotal in translating business needs into scalable, secure, and interoperable architectural solutions that support our mission to deliver high-quality educational experiences across Europe.

As a Solutions Architect, you will work closely with product teams, Tech leads, developers, and fellow architects to design robust solutions aligned with our reference architecture and strategic goals. You will play a key role in ensuring that our platforms are future-proof, well-integrated, and capable of supporting diverse educational markets.

Key Responsibilities

Strategic & Technical Leadership
‚Ä¢ Design end-to-end solutions for digital learning platforms, ensuring alignment with enterprise architecture and business requirements.
‚Ä¢ Provide architectural guidance and support to engineering delivery teams throughout the development lifecycle.
‚Ä¢ Evaluate and introduce modern architectural frameworks, tools, and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Analyse dependencies and integration points across systems and products to ensure interoperability and scalability.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to solution documentation, gap analysis, and technical feasibility assessments.

Cross-Domain Collaboration
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with international architecture peers to define and evolve reference architectures.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with product, engineering, and business teams to ensure coherence and reuse across domains.
‚Ä¢ Support strategic planning and roadmap development for platform evolution and shared services.
‚Ä¢ Facilitate architectural walkthroughs and technical workshops across business units.
‚Ä¢ Act as a key contributor in enterprise-wide architecture forums.

Governance & Operational Oversight
‚Ä¢ Support the Architecture Competence in scoping and reviewing solution designs, guidelines, and ways of working.
‚Ä¢ Ensure architectural consistency and adherence to Sanoma Learning's strategic technology direction.
‚Ä¢ Maintain a clear overview of solution components and their alignment with enterprise standards.

Talent Development & Thought Leadership
‚Ä¢ Promote architectural excellence, innovation, and knowledge sharing across teams.
‚Ä¢ Foster a culture of continuous learning and technical leadership.
‚Ä¢ Participate in architecture-related events and communities within Sanoma Learning.

Must-Have Technical Skills

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related field

5+ years of experience in solution architecture or software design

Strong knowledge of cloud-native architectures, APIs, and integration patterns

Experience working in agile environments

Ability to balance strategic thinking with hands-on technical problem solving

Excellent collaboration and communication skills

Fluent in English

Expertise & Behaviours

Proven ability to translate business needs into scalable technical solutions

Skilled in cross-functional collaboration and stakeholder engagement

Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail

Comfortable working in a fast-paced, international environment

Passionate about education technology and digital transformation

Committed to continuous learning and knowledge sharing

Nice-to-Have Skills

Experience with educational platforms and interoperability standards

Familiarity with AWS, Kubernetes, and observability tools like Datadog

Knowledge of OAuth2, SSO, and identity management systems

Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures

Background in data architecture and analytics platforms

Proficiency in other European languages

What We Offer

A key role shaping the architecture of Sanoma Learning's digital platforms

A collaborative, learning-oriented work environment

Opportunities to work with modern technologies and impactful projects

Strong support for your professional growth and technical development

Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits

Flexible hybrid work model

About Sanoma Learning

How do you prepare students for the world, engage their curiosity and inspire them to grow? That is the main question of teachers all around the world. At Sanoma Learning, it has always been our mission to help to find and develop best-in-class answers to this question. If you join us, it means that you embark on an exciting journey to help shape the future of learning for primary, secondary and vocational education. We believe that your journey is our success as a company.

Sanoma Learning is a leading K12 European learning company, operating in 12 countries. Our learning products and services enable and support teachers and schools to develop the talents of every child to reach their potential. By offering printed and digital learning content, as well as digital learning and teaching platforms for primary, secondary and vocational education, we want to grow our positive impact on learning across Europe. With over 3000 employees, we help shape the future of education for 25+ million students.

Sanoma Learning is an equal opportunity employer; we are committed to inclusion and diversity, ensuring equal opportunity for all applicants without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or any other characteristics.

√Årea clave: Tecnolog√≠a de la informaci√≥n y seguridad inform√°tica

Nivel de experiencia: Profesionales con experiencia

We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Power Platform Solution Architect (h/m/d) to lead the design, implementation, and governance of enterprise solutions built on Microsoft Power Platform. This role will play a strategic part in defining scalable and secure architectures aligned with business goals, collaborating with stakeholders, IT leaders, and development teams to drive innovation and digital transformation.

A Power Platform solution architect is responsible for designing, architecting, and overseeing the implementation of end-to-end solutions using the Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Pages, and Dataverse). They bridge the gap between business needs and technical solutions, ensuring the platform is used effectively and strategically within an organization.

Key Responsibilities:

The main key responsibilities are:

1. Solution Design and Architecture:
‚Ä¢ Conceptualizing Solutions:
‚Ä¢ Designing the overall architecture of Power Platform solutions, considering various components like Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Dataverse.
‚Ä¢ Technical Strategy:
‚Ä¢ Defining the technical approach for building and deploying solutions, including integrations with other systems and services.
‚Ä¢ Data Modelling:
‚Ä¢ Designing the data model within Dataverse or other data sources to ensure efficient and scalable data storage and retrieval.
‚Ä¢ Security Modelling:
‚Ä¢ Implementing security measures to protect data and applications, adhering to organizational policies and industry best practices.
‚Ä¢ Integration Planning:
‚Ä¢ Designing how Power Platform solutions will integrate with other systems, including other Microsoft services (like Azure) and third-party applications.

2. Implementation and Governance:
‚Ä¢ Guiding Development:
‚Ä¢ Providing technical leadership and guidance to development teams during the implementation phase.
‚Ä¢ Code Reviews:
‚Ä¢ Ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices through code reviews.
‚Ä¢ Testing and Deployment:
‚Ä¢ Managing testing procedures and deployment strategies to ensure smooth and reliable releases.
‚Ä¢ Project Governance:
‚Ä¢ Establishing and maintaining project governance processes to ensure solutions are delivered on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards.

3. Stakeholder Management and Communication:
‚Ä¢ Requirement Gathering:
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements.
‚Ä¢ Communication:
‚Ä¢ Effectively communicating technical concepts and solutions to both technical and non-technical audiences.
‚Ä¢ Relationship Building:
‚Ä¢ Building strong relationships with business leaders, developers, and other IT teams to ensure alignment and collaboration.

4. Staying Current:
‚Ä¢ Platform Expertise: Maintaining in-depth knowledge of the Power Platform and its capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Staying Updated: Keeping abreast of the latest Power Platform updates, features, and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Thought Leadership: Providing thought leadership on new and emerging Microsoft solutions related to the Power Platform.

In essence, a Power Platform Solution Architect acts as a technical leader and trusted technical advisor, ensuring that Power Platform solutions are well-designed, effectively implemented, and deliver significant value to the organization.

Technical Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 7+ years of experience in enterprise solution delivery using Microsoft Power Platform.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in cloud solution architecture with Microsoft Azure.
‚Ä¢ Strong expertise in Dataverse, Model-Driven Apps, Canvas Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI.
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with ALM, DevOps, and CI/CD pipelines for Power Platform.
‚Ä¢ Experience in Dynamics 365 CE/CRM projects (desirable).
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of data modeling, security, API integrations, Azure Functions, API Management, Logic Apps.
‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of Power Platform and licensing models

Certifications (Required / Preferred)
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Solution Architect (required).
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Solution Architect expert (preferred).
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate (preferred).
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert (preferred)

Soft Skills
‚Ä¢ Strategic thinker with strong enterprise architecture vision.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills to engage both technical and business audiences.
‚Ä¢ Strong leadership and mentoring capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Problem-solving mindset with a focus on innovation.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban).

We offer you an excellent opportunity to grow and develop your career in a leading multinational organization. For more information about us or what we do:

Senior Business Analyst Job Description

This role focuses on building the future with cutting-edge AI technology. The successful candidate will lead business analysis for Payments, Collections, Receivables, Cash Management, and Trade APIs aligned to ISO 20022 and Open Banking/CBPR+ standards.

The ideal candidate will own AI governance for the squad: LLMOps policies, prompt/version control, data minimization, model audit trails, and compliance readiness (PSD2, GDPR, DORA). They will translate regulatory and business requirements into API-first designs, user stories, process maps, and data models.

This position requires collaboration with Product Owners, Architects, Security and Platform teams to align on API contracts, schema registry usage, and monetization models. The candidate will define metrics, SLOs, and SLAs with Platform for global consistency; own policy and governance artifacts for audits.

Experience with AI-native tools (ChatGPT Enterprise, GitHub Copilot, Azure OpenAI) to accelerate requirements, test-case generation and traceability is required. The candidate must also coordinate API monetization and billing strategy with Platform, and ensure technical enablement for metering and billing hooks.

Required Skills and Qualifications
‚Ä¢ Minimum Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Certifications such as CBAP, API Specialist, Agile Product Owner, or AI Business Strategy.
‚Ä¢ Experience with data mesh, Kafka streaming, and schema registries.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in English and Spanish (tested).
‚Ä¢ Preferred Qualifications/Skills:
‚Ä¢ 8+ years in financial services; 4+ years in API or BaaS transformation.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of ISO 20022 (pain.001/pain.002/pacs.008/camt.054), Open Banking, and PSD2.
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of API security (OAuth 2.1, mTLS, OIDC) and data privacy (GDPR, DORA).
‚Ä¢ Experience with Apigee or IBM API Connect and schema governance for event-driven platforms.
‚Ä¢ Exposure to AI governance, LLMOps practices, and enterprise prompt engineering.

Benefits and Opportunities

Join a global transformation initiative driving next-generation Banking-as-a-Service (BaaS) and API Platform. As Senior Business Analyst, you will bridge business vision and digital execution, owning AI governance and ensuring compliance across API and AI-native systems.

Powered by curiosity, courage, and innovation, our teams implement data, technology, and AI to create tomorrow, today.
